Key: <<No event data for today!>>
Translation: <<No hay datos de eventos para hoy!>>

Key: We found you, Itsuka-kun!
Translation:
¡Te hemos encontrado, Itsuka-kun!
se hubiera quedado sola en su sufrimiento, se habría vuelto loca…)

Key: ...Huh?

Wandering around with the intent to seduce
someone again, are you?!
Translation: ¿Vagando por ahí con la intención de seducir a alguien otra vez, no?

Key:
Huh? What?
I-I don't understand what you're saying at all...
Translation: ¿Eh? ¿Qué? No entiendo nada de lo que dices...

Key:
Even though you have someone like Tohka-chan,
using your amorous gaze on other women is
unforgivable!
Translation:
Aunque tengas a alguien como Tohka-chan, ¡usar tu mirada
amorosa con otras mujeres es imperdonable!

Key: That’s right, you enemy of women!
Pig slop!
May the gods strike you down!

H-Hey, wait. I don't know what you're upset
about!
Translation: H-Hey, espera. ¡No sé por qué estás enfadada!

Key: Then hurry, and return to Tohka-chan's side...
Translation: Entonces date prisa, y vuelve al lado de Tohka-chan...

Key: Wh-What is up with you guys...?
Urgh, what's over there?!
...Target, spotted!
Enemy ship sighted! Heave ho!
We won't let you escape, Shido Itsuka!

W-Wait just a moment. Why are you making me
out to be the enemy?
Translation: Espera un momento. ¿Por qué me haces pasar por el enemigo?

Key:
Together, we have formed the "Itsuka
Observation Division" to make sure you don't
cheat on Tohka-chan, for her sake!
Translation:
Juntos hemos formado la "División de Observación Itsuka" para
asegurarnos de que no engañas a Tohka-chan, ¡por su bien!

Key:
Huh?! Hey, wait. Couldn't you have picked
a less incriminating name...?
Translation:
¡¿Eh?! Eh, espera. ¿No podías haber elegido un
nombre menos incriminatorio...?

Key:
Be quiet! Listen carefully, Shido Itsuka!
Should a wicked thought enter your heart,
we will bring down the hammer of justice!
Translation:
¡Silencio! ¡Escucha con atención, Shido Itsuka! ¡Si un pensamiento
malvado entra en tu corazón, haremos caer el martillo de la justicia!

Key: Whatever you say! I'll be going now!
Ah, wait! Dang it!
Don't let him escape! After him!
Hyeeeeeek!! Why are you following me?!

Curse you, Shido Itsuka! To think he would
escape being trapped by the "Itsuka Observation
Team"!
Translation:
¡Maldito seas, Shido Itsuka! ¡Y pensar que se libraría de
ser atrapado por el "Equipo de Observación Itsuka"!

Key:
We have to hurry and find him, or that wild beast
will sink his poisonous fangs into yet another
victim!
Translation:
Tenemos que darnos prisa y encontrarlo, ¡o esa bestia salvaje
hundirá sus colmillos venenosos en otra víctima más!

Key:
Find him! We have to find him as quickly as
possible!
It's them, again.

(Like hell I'm gonna be found.
I'll hide and let them pass...)
Translation: (Ni en sueños me van a encontrar. Me esconderé y las dejaré pasar...)

Key: Too bad, we lost sight of him.

Is he trying to make Tohka-chan cry again,
that bastard?
Translation: ¿Está intentando hacer llorar a Tohka-chan otra vez, ese bastardo?

Key: Poor Tohka-chan...

You know, when I think about it, we're quite
the faithful bunch, aren't we?
Translation: Sabes, cuando pienso en ello, somos un grupo bastante fiel, ¿no?

Key:
You might be right. Without even considering
ourselves, we merely pray for Tohka-chan's
happiness...
Translation:
Puede que tengas razón. Sin siquiera considerarnos a nosotros
mismos, sólo rezamos por la felicidad de Tohka-chan...

Key:
We sacrifice ourselves in the name of another's
romance. Ohhh, what steadfast, otome hearts
we have!
Translation:
Nos sacrificamos en nombre del romance de otro. Ohhh,
¡qué corazones tan firmes y otomanos tenemos!

Key: We are so. Totally. Heroic...
(Yeah. I'm getting out of here...)
We've found you, Shido Itsukaaaa!
Gah, you guys again!
There's nowhere to escape, you cheating jerk!
Translation: ¡No hay por donde escapar, imbécil tramposo!

Key: Oogh, cheating jerk, you guys...
...Now, you'll accept this present from us.
Translation: ...Ahora, aceptarás este regalo de nuestra parte.

Key: Present...?

That's right. For Tohka-chan's sake, I got a pair
of admission tickets for the Tengu Tower
observation deck.
Translation:
Sí, es cierto. Por el bien de Tohka-chan, conseguí un par de
entradas para la plataforma de observación de la Torre Tengu.

Key: I-I don't need your help!

Rrrgh, stop struggling! Use these tickets to
invite Tohka-chan on a date!
Translation:
Rrrgh, ¡deja de luchar! ¡Usa estos tickets para
invitar a Tohka-chan a una cita!

Key:
L-Let go of me!
I-I can invite her on a date myself!
Translation: ¡Suéltame! ¡Puedo invitarla a una cita yo mismo!

Key: ...Huh?
What did you just say...?

You were going to invite Tohka-chan to a date
on your own...?
Translation: ¿Ibas a invitar a Tohka-chan a una cita tú solo...?

Key: So our earnestness got through to you?

Oh, well. I'm not sure if I was going to ask
out Tohka today...
Translation: Ah, bueno... No estoy seguro si iba a invitar a salir a Tohka hoy...

Key: What did you say?!
So you really are a rotten Lothario character!
Translation: ¡Así que realmente eres un personaje mujeriego y despreciable!

Key: I knew it! Divine punishment is necessary!
Aaack, stooop!
Wait, Shido Itsuka!
...You three again!
Today of all days, you won't escape!
We won't forgive a playboy jackass like you!
Translation: ¡No perdonaremos a un imbécil playboy como tú!

Key:
Playboy jackass... I have no idea what you're
talking about, you know!
Translation: Playboy idiota... ¡No tengo ni idea de lo que estás hablando!

Key:
Don't play dumb! You were dating a girl
from another school!
Translation: ¡No te hagas el tonto! ¡Salías con una chica de otra escuela!

Key: I-I don't know anything about that!

No no, I heard that you were spotted walking into
a hotel with an older, beautiful office lady!
Translation:
No, no, he oído que te han visto entrando en un hotel
con una señora de oficina mayor y guapa.

Key: Th-That's a false accusation!

I saw him leading a young looking girl by the
hand around back!
Translation: Le vi llevando de la mano a una chica joven por detrás.

Key: That'd be a straight up felony!

That's right, you lolicon bastard! We'll cut you
down here!

W-Wait a second! Do you have proof of that?!
I don't have memory of any of those things,
when was this?!
Translation:
¡Espera un segundo! ¡¿Tienes pruebas de eso?! No tengo
memoria de ninguna de esas cosas, ¡¿cuándo fue esto?!

Key: Yesterday!
...Excuse me?
...Huh?

What are you saying? There's only one of me,
you know? There's no way I could go on so many
dates at once, in one day!
Translation:
¿Qué estás diciendo? Sólo hay uno de mí, ¿sabes? No hay
manera de que pudiera ir a tantas citas a la vez, ¡en un día!

Key: ...That's super weird, am I misremembering?

...Now that you say it, my memory
does feel sort of hazy...
Translation: ...Ahora que lo dices, mi memoria está un poco borrosa...

Key: Could it be, some illusion of youth...?

(All right. I'll use this time to get away. Until
then, you keep pondering amongst yourselves!)
Translation:
(De acuerdo. Aprovecharé este tiempo para irme. Hasta entonces,
¡segan reflexionando entre ustedes!)

Key: Hmmmmm...
